item.title: As a Result of Breaking an Otome Game, the Villainess Young Lady Becomes a Cheat!
item.dc:creator: Ghajik
item.description: Charlotte, who reincarnated as a villain girl in a maiden game, started to avoid the death flag. The goal is to spread the sake that I loved in this world! However, the juice and holy water that I made for trial were all nonstandard … A different world, “Sake” fantasy, opened by a cheat girl!
item.content:encoded:
Charlotte, who reincarnated as a villain girl in a maiden game, started to avoid the death flag. The goal is to spread the sake that I loved in this world! However, the juice and holy water that I made for trial were all nonstandard …

A different world, “Sake” fantasy, opened by a cheat girl!

item.title: I’m Nearly 30, but This Is My First Love
item.dc:creator: Ghajik
item.description:
“Inoue-san, you’re my first boyfriend…”, says Yamamoto, 28 years old. “I don’t have a lot of experience either, but we’ll work through it together”, says Inoue, 32 years old. In reality, Inoue’s never been with a girl either, but he couldn’t tell Yamamoto that. A fluffy love-comedy about the adventures of this innocent and pure...
Continue Reading →
item.content:encoded:
“Inoue-san, you’re my first boyfriend…”, says Yamamoto, 28 years old.
“I don’t have a lot of experience either, but we’ll work through it together”, says Inoue, 32 years old.
In reality, Inoue’s never been with a girl either, but he couldn’t tell Yamamoto that.
A fluffy love-comedy about the adventures of this innocent and pure couple.

item.title: We May Be an Inexperienced Couple but…
item.dc:creator: Ghajik
item.description:
This is a story of Ikuma and Sumika, two childhood friends who recently got married and started a brand new life together. At first sight, they seem like a happy couple with nothing to worry about, there is one problem: they have trouble having sex. With both of them having zero prior experience, this awkward...
Continue Reading →
item.content:encoded: This is a story of Ikuma and Sumika, two childhood friends who recently got married and started a brand new life together. At first sight, they seem like a happy couple with nothing to worry about, there is one problem: they have trouble having sex. With both of them having zero prior experience, this awkward couple tries their best(?) to figure out together how to do it for the first time.

item.title: Miracle App Store
item.dc:creator: Ghajik
item.description: We’re stuck in our mundane lives. Dreaming of the lives we wish we had. But what if all your dreams could be solved with a few clicks. Would you take it?
item.content:encoded: We’re stuck in our mundane lives. Dreaming of the lives we wish we had. But what if all your dreams could be solved with a few clicks. Would you take it?
